issue.title: [Packaging/Docker] Python tests on alpine miss pytest dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4043](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4043). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```java

Using /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages
Searching for numpy==1.15.4
Best match: numpy 1.15.4
Adding numpy 1.15.4 to easy-install.pth file
Using /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages
Finished processing dependencies for pyarrow==0.11.1.dev385+g9c8ddae1
/
/bin/sh: pytest: not found
The command "docker-compose run python-alpine" exited with 127.
```
